features: 【Rechargeable Silent Mouse】: Built-in rechargeable battery, no need change battery.it can be easily charged using the included USB cable. 2 hours charging, you can use it for 7-15 days. Special soundless design for the right and left buttons, Noiseless click, no worrying about disturbing others beside you, let you concentrate on work.

【Colorful Light】: 7 different color changes randomly while in use, offering soothing lighting, creating cool and fancy atmosphere for work and play.This wireless mouse Bluetooth with lights can give you more fun during office time.

【Energy Saving】: The mouse will be in sleep mode in 5 mins of inactivity. You can choose use the 2.4G wireless mouse when the mouse botton switch is on the 2.4G mode,or connect your laptop's Bluetooth to use the Bluetooth mouse, easy to switch,suitable for any occasion.

【Portable Mouse and Operation Notice】: Size About 4.4 x 2.3 x 1.1 inch,it can be easily put into your laptop bag and ultra-space saving.Slim and lightweight,durable ergonomic mouse is perfect for travel.The USB receiver is stored inside the back of the mouse.No need for a driver,Plug and Play!Automatic sleep mode and wake-up mode are installed to save energy.Pls Turn off the mouse LED light when not in use to expand the using life.

【WIDE COMPATIBILITY】: Accurate wireless bluetooth mouse with a working distance up to 10 meters (33 feet) for fast data transfer without delay or loss. Compatible with Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10, 11, Windows ME, Mac OS and more. Also supports bluetooth connection, this LED wireless + bluetooth mouse is perfect for desktop, laptop, tablet, PC, Macbook, iPad and other bluetooth devices. for home, office, travel and more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have been extremely satisfied with its performance. This sleek and compact mouse has made my work on the computer much easier and more efficient.One of the things I love about this mouse is its design. It has a smooth and ergonomic shape that fits perfectly in my hand, making it comfortable to use for extended periods of time. The matte finish also adds a touch of elegance to the overall look of the mouse.The Bluetooth connectivity is another feature that I appreciate. It allows me to connect the mouse to my laptop without having to deal with messy cords or USB receivers. This makes it very convenient to use, especially when I am on the go.The mouse has a high precision optical sensor that provides smooth and accurate tracking on any surface. I have used it on my desk, a mousepad, and even on my bed sheets, and it works flawlessly every time. The scrolling wheel is also very responsive and makes scrolling through long documents a breeze.Overall, I am extremely happy with my purchase of the KANMABPC Bluetooth Mouse. It has exceeded my expectations in terms of design, performance, and convenience. I highly recommend it to anyone in need of a reliable and stylish Bluetooth mouse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My laptop touchpad stopped working so it was time to get a mouse.This was easy to install and self-chargeable it was more than I expected.Great price and excellent product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good for what it is, dual mode is nice to have
reviews.reviewText: I needed a mouse for my laptop while on a long work assignment so I really just wanted something cheap to get me through. As long as it worked, my requirements were met. But I admit that I bought this because of its dual mode Bluetooth/USB wireless functionality. That means it should theoretically work with pretty much any other device I own.It is a little bit bigger than I expected - it's pretty flat, but it's also fairly long. As the box advertises that it's for a "mobile office", I was expecting more of a travel mouse size. But it's ok. It's light, at least, which makes me think it's mostly hollow and could have been smaller, but whatever. Just realize that it's kind of in between the size of a normal mouse and a travel mouse, which might be perfect for some people.It feels pretty good but it is covered in that matte finish that shows fingerprints really easily and I'll bet will wear off pretty quickly. I've only had it for a week or so and already the finger areas on mine are shiny. We'll see how it holds up.Functionally it works as well as any other wireless mouse I've owned. (I actually own several already, just forgot to bring any of them with me when I bought this - which has obviously happened before!) It's quite reliable in 2.4ghz wireless (USB dongle) mode. Bluetooth is spottier, but that's been my experience with literally every Bluetooth mouse. I'd never buy a straight Bluetooth mouse again; I just considered Bluetooth a bonus in this one in case I need it. I did try this mouse in Bluetooth mode and it mostly works fine, but a couple of times I'd wake up my computer and the mouse pointer would be slow or laggy or wouldn't reconnect or whatever. That's just Bluetooth for ya; it's not unique to this mouse or mice in general. I switched to 2.4ghz mode and that fixed all the problems.Battery life seems ok. I have had it die but it is rechargeable and you can use it while it's charging (as a wired mouse). But it seems to last a reasonable amount of time; I can't say how many hours but I've used it for several days of fairly heavy use (maybe 8-10 hours of computer use per day, with however much mouse use comes with that) before it starts dying. That's enough for me for a travel mouse, then I just plug it in for a few hours. The battery must be tiny in this thing but it works well enough. I will say that the AAA-powered 2.4Ghz mice I've had/still have will often go for months before needing new batteries, but then if your mouse does die and you have no more batteries around, you're stuck. I've had it happen. So it's a tradeoff. If you want the best of both worlds, you could get a mouse like that and just use rechargeable AAA's in it. (But then you need to have your charger with you too, so it's an extra thing to remember and carry.)Overall I'm happy enough with this purchase. It's not like it costs much and it's getting the job done for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great inexpensive mouse! *For iPad users read this* :P
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I was wanting to order a Bluetooth mouse for my iPad Pro 11 that would not break the bank as I am a broke adult. I found this mouse, read the reviews and watched the videos before buying. I was sold so I decided to order this mouse. It came in one day and looks exactly like the pictures and is wonderful! I got it yesterday so I only have been using it for a couple of hours now. I work nights, so I only plan on using this mouse at night when I am at work doing my journaling, planner, etc. Nothing major. I do have a gaming laptop that I use for other needs. One weird thing to me is, the scroll ring is odd to me lol. My mouse I use for my laptop is programmed differently. For this mouse, when you roll the ring thing up, it moves the page down and rolling it down, makes the page go up. My laptop mouse doesn’t do that so I wasn’t used to this haha.I haven’t checked out the sleep mode or whatever else the mouse features are as whenever I am not using my mouse, I make sure to shut it off. I do notice when I am typing and not using the mouse, the colourful lights stop and it just glows a dim red colour. It comes back on when you move it though. It is quiet when clicking and the texture of the mouse is very smooth like velvet ooo! Lol. You can use the mouse to lock, open, scroll, close apps, etc. Came fully charged too. When I plugged it in to charge it, it glowed green so assuming it’s fully charged haha. 🤷🏾‍♀️Oh, for those who plan on getting this for their iPads too, if you are like me and use your iPad horizontal 100% of the time, if you have an app that forces your iPad vertically, make sure to turn off the rotation lock for you device because the mouse will think you are still using your iPad in the horizontal layout. It then will work just fine. No need to back out of the app at all. For $5.98 + tax, this is a great buy! I recommend! I think that is about it? Anyways check out the video and picture!! Hope this helps!
